Posts.Content: Nov 17, 2009 08:16AM BFFofStageIV wrote: Oops Renee ... CHEST Mets! My friend started Hormone therapy Saturday.   Had an infusion yesterday to help it along! She will meet a surgeon tomorrow to discuss the possibility of removing ovaries! We are keeping it real ... with a lot of praying!
Posts.Title: BFF of Stage IV -- What do I do? BFFofStageIV BFFofStageIV

Posts.Content: Nov 12, 2009 08:04AM BFFofStageIV wrote: Thank you everyone ... such great advice!   We talked last night and she is going to join this site!  Your right .. this is not happening to ME, it just feels like it is.  I love my friend and will do anything she needs, all the while keeping it real!    Her biopsies are all done and the cancer has traveled into her check cavity.  She is HER2+/ER+.   They removed many nodes and all are positive, yet it does not appear in any vital organs.  After meeting with Dana Farber and getting a second opinion, she will be starting her hormone therapy this morning.   My friend has a long road ahead of her and I plan to be there any way I can! THANK YOU ALL - and HUGS & Prays! Lisa
Posts.Title: BFF of Stage IV -- What do I do? BFFofStageIV BFFofStageIV
